00033 import os
00034 import sys
00035 
00036 def test__get_check_dirs():
00037     # just a tripwire, no way to assert the actual values w/o identical reimplementation
00038     from rosclean import _get_check_dirs
00039     vals = _get_check_dirs()
00040     for path, desc in vals:
00041         assert os.path.isdir(path)
00042     
00043 def test_get_human_readable_disk_usage():
00044     from rosclean import get_human_readable_disk_usage
00045     val = get_human_readable_disk_usage(get_test_path())
00046     assert val
00047     
00048 def get_test_path():
00049     return os.path.abspath(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__)))
00050 
00051 def test_get_disk_usage():
00052     from rosclean import get_disk_usage
00053     val = get_disk_usage(get_test_path())
00054     assert val > 0
00055 
00056 def test_cmd():
00057     from rosclean import rosclean_main
00058     try:
00059         rosclean_main(['rosclean', 'fake'])
00060         assert False, "should have raised sys exit"
00061     except SystemExit:
00062         pass
00063 
00064     # should run cleanly
00065     try:
00066         rosclean_main(['rosclean', 'check'])
00067     except SystemExit:
00068         assert False, "failed with sys exit"
